name: Ayuda

page1.title: Cómo utilizar el Bot
page1.description: Cuando mencionas este bot en una respuesta a un mensaje, genera una imagen a partir de ese mensaje.
page1.separate: Si especifica más de uno, sepárelos con `,`

page4.title: About Custom Quote
page4.description: Custom Quote feature allows you to create a Quote from a fictitious statement.
page4.2: Both the creator and the recipient must allow custom quotes in the Web Dashboard.
page4.4: Use the `/custom_quote` command. If `quote_as` is specified, the custom Quote will be created in the user's name, otherwise in your name.

page5.title: About Web Dashboard
page5.link: You can access the dashboard from the URL above.
page5.description: The dashboard allows customization of user and server settings.

only_executor: Only the user who invoked this help message can execute this action.
